item.title: About
item.description:
Hello!

  • I’m abel.
  • I’m a master’s student.
  • My research focuses on Multi-Modal Information Extraction.
  • (Plus Music Generation and Multi-Modal Large Language Model for my job)
  • This blog will not be update on time, sorry.
  • Thank you for visiting.

Wanna know more? Contact me:

  • Github
  • Email

Education

Master Student

  • Computer Science and Technology
  • GPA Top 4%
  • the Presidential Scholarship
  • the First-class Scholarship
  • the Outstanding Graduate Student

  • Northeastern University, China
  • Internet of Things
  • GPA Top 6%
  • the Outstanding Undergraduate Graduates)
